00067 
00068 void initElbeemMesh(struct Scene *scene, struct Object *ob,
00069             int *numVertices, float **vertices,
00070       int *numTriangles, int **triangles,
00071       int useGlobalCoords, int modifierIndex)
00072 {
00073     DerivedMesh *dm = NULL;
00074     MVert *mvert;
00075     MFace *mface;
00076     int countTris=0, i, totvert, totface;
00077     float *verts;
00078     int *tris;
00079 
00080     dm = mesh_create_derived_index_render(scene, ob, CD_MASK_BAREMESH, modifierIndex);
00081     //dm = mesh_create_derived_no_deform(ob,NULL);
00082 
00083     mvert = dm->getVertArray(dm);
00084     mface = dm->getTessFaceArray(dm);
00085     totvert = dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00086     totface = dm->getNumTessFaces(dm);
00087 
00088     *numVertices = totvert;
00089     verts = MEM_callocN( totvert*3*sizeof(float), "elbeemmesh_vertices");
00090     for (i=0; i<totvert; i++) {
00091         copy_v3_v3(&verts[i*3], mvert[i].co);
00092         if (useGlobalCoords) { mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, &verts[i*3]); }
00093     }
00094     *vertices = verts;
00095 
00096     for (i=0; i<totface; i++) {
00097         countTris++;
00098         if (mface[i].v4) { countTris++; }
00099     }
00100     *numTriangles = countTris;
00101     tris = MEM_callocN( countTris*3*sizeof(int), "elbeemmesh_triangles");
00102     countTris = 0;
00103     for (i=0; i<totface; i++) {
00104         int face[4];
00105         face[0] = mface[i].v1;
00106         face[1] = mface[i].v2;
00107         face[2] = mface[i].v3;
00108         face[3] = mface[i].v4;
00109 
00110         tris[countTris*3+0] = face[0];
00111         tris[countTris*3+1] = face[1];
00112         tris[countTris*3+2] = face[2];
00113         countTris++;
00114         if (face[3]) {
00115             tris[countTris*3+0] = face[0];
00116             tris[countTris*3+1] = face[2];
00117             tris[countTris*3+2] = face[3];
00118             countTris++;
00119         }
00120     }
00121     *triangles = tris;
00122 
00123     dm->release(dm);
00124 }
